about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my skills, experience, and approach to AI/ML development.
about.summary: Data Scientist specializing in Machine Learning and AI, with hands-on experience developing production-ready solutions in R&D and business environments across France and Tunisia. Passionate about solving complex real-world problems through data-driven solutions, from experimental research to scalable deployments.

aiIntegration.description: Designing computer vision and NLP systems with deep learning; building real-time inference pipelines and evaluation workflows.

fullStackDevelopment.title: Model Development & Optimization
fullStackDevelopment.description: Experiment tracking, hyperparameter tuning, and performance optimization for robust ML models ready for production.

modernPractices.title: MLOps & Best Practices
